channel.title: Sound of Falling on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sound of Falling on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oscars: Germany Selects Mascha Schilinski’s ‘Sound of Falling’ as Best Int’l Feature Film Submission
item.description: The drama premiered in competition at this year’s Cannes Film Festival, where it opened the festival and won the jury prize ex aequo.
